title: Amplitude (Ps2) Soundtrack
description:
Amplitude (Ps2) Soundtrack

:    dd   jjj TTTTTTT        kk             :
     dd         TTT     eee  kk  kk   aa aa

I'm back again, and this time, I've brought together the Amplitude Soundtrack, sequel to FreQuency, ripped by gh.ffshrine.org once again.

This next part may look a little familiar if you have seen the other torrent, http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4355166/FreQuency_Game_Soundtrack__rip_

Anyone who downloads this, PLEASE seed past when you get all the files. 
I will seed for quite a while, hopefully.

If you like the game as much as I do, you may like to have the songs that are in it, and if you haven't even heard of the game, I'd suggest you try it. Listening to these songs may help you decide whether you want to track down a copy of the game.

Related game info: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amplitude_(video_game)
Source of files: Galbadia Hotel (http://gh.ffshrine.org/)
191k-217k

I've decided to group the songs by their grouping in the game, but it won't change how you listen to them, right?

EDIT: Yes, some of these are a little edited, but they DID come from a game released into the public with a "T-rating", even though any 13+ year old would know the words just from having a life, possibly with public schools.
I see it as more authentic to the game to keep them the way they are.

(AAA) - denotes an original track created specifically for Amplitude

Stage 1 - Neotropolis
P.O.D. vs. The Crystal Method - Boom (The Crystal Method Mix)
Garbage - Cherry Lips
Quarashi - Baseline
Kodomo (Chris Child) featuring Melissa Kaplan - Shades of Blue (AAA)
Logan 7 - Uptown Saturday Night

Stage 2 - Beat Factory
Run-D.M.C. - King of Rock (X-Ecutioners Mix) (AAA)
The Baldwin Brothers - Urban Tumbleweed
Weezer - Dope Nose
David Bowie - Everyone Says 'Hi' (Metro Mix)
Freezepop - Super-Sprode (AAA)

Stage 3 - Metaclouds
Pink - Respect
Papa Roach - M-80 (Explosive Energy Movement)
Mekon with Roxanne Shante - What's Going On
Herbie Hancock - Rockit (2.002 Remix)
Production Club - Rockstar (AAA)

Stage 4 - Elektro Kore
DJ HMX with Plural - Cool Baby (AAA)
BT and Wildchild - Kimosabe (AAA)
Manchild - Nitro Narcosis (AAA)
Slipknot - I Am Hated
Game Boyz - Push (AAA)

Stage 5 - Blastlands
Blink-182 - The Rock Show
Styles of Beyond - Subculture (Dieselboy + Kaos Rock Remix)
Akrobatik and Symbion Project - Out The Box (AAA)
Symbion Project - Synthesized (AAA)
Komputer Kontroller - Robot Rockerz (AAA)
Cosmonaut Zero - Spaztik (AAA)

UL by djteka
